item.title: #en @ 1532480265385304069
item.description: What can we do with #opendata? Quite a lot! Community policing & asking journals to check data providence would be a way to let more data be truly open, which allows for equitable access, awesome APIs, all kinds of cool websites & apps & sharing to help others analyse! https://t.co/BCmG6hd7NN
